name: Saint Seiya: Sanctuary Battle
description:
THEIR COSMOS STILL BURNS BRIGHT!

A dramatic battle action adventure based on the beloved <Saint Seiya Senki> chapter.

Awaken your seventh sense in this extravagant, manga-infused adventure.

  • Reveal your awesome inner strength your seventh sense as one of the Knights of the Zodiac in this faithful, frantic recreation of the cult anime series.
  • Increase strength, defensive blocks and your ability to harness the cosmos by pursuing the mighty Gold Saints through 12 thrilling levels.
  • Reveal new, specially written stories that embellish the original Saint Seiya universe as you play.
